Class SubstringAndLocations

  • java.lang.Object
    • SubstringAndLocations

  • public class SubstringAndLocations
extends java.lang.Object
    Class: SubstringAndLocations
    Description: TheSubstringAndLocations class takes a list of DNASequence objects and a specific subString and searches the DNASequences for the subString. This class keeps track of the location of the subString within the DNASequence and the substring that it searches.

    Author: Marc Kuniansky
    Creation date: May 26, 2015

    Modifications:
    Date Name Reason
    ---- ---- ------
    May 25, 2015, Marc Kuniansky, Implemented the constructor and the getSubsequence and searchSequence methods.
    May 26, 2015, Marc Kuniansky, Implemented the toString method. Modified the gerSubsequence method to return a list of Location objects rather than String objects. Modified the constuctor to only take two parameters.

    Version:
    May 26, 2015
    Author:
    Marc Kuniansky

      Returns the substring being examined.
      void searchForSubstring() 
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a string of all the locations at which a subSequence appears, formatted in the following way: sumSequence: Location1 Location2 Location3...

    • Method Detail

      • getSubSequence

        public java.lang.String getSubSequence()
        Returns the substring being examined.
        Returns:
        A subSequence as a String.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string of all the locations at which a subSequence appears, formatted in the following way: sumSequence: Location1 Location2 Location3... where each location is a valid Location object.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        A String which contains the subSequence and all of the locations at which it appears.
